derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from Spanish mezcal, from Nahuatl mexcalli

means.word_mean: 1. a small spineless globe-shaped cactus; source of mescal buttons
2. a colorless Mexican liquor distilled from fermented juices of certain desert plants of the genus Agavaceae (especially the century plant)
